You have to figure out what is going on here. So you decide to sneak on the boat.

you creep across the wood that leads up the ship's side, and walk onto the deck of the boat. On the boats deck, you walk past the steering wheel and attempt to open the door into the ship's upper-level room. The door opens and you step into the ship's room. What you see inside the ship is disturbing.

Inside the boat, there's some stairs leading below deck, and a desk with a large, cluttered bulletin board above it. A large paper map of Chegckle is on the bulletin board, with lots of red X's drawn on it. The stairs leading downward have strange turcoise stains on them You also see a set of, what appears to be fireworks next to the desk. The fireworks seem to be hooked up to various cans of gas labeled things like 'flammable,' 'corosive,' 'toxic,' and 'biohazard.'

Then you hear the sound of distant footsteps, followed indistinct speaking.

Go Below DeckGet off of the boat
